sourcesContent:
import {useState} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function productDetails(){ const [product,setProduct]=useState(null) const {id}=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/product/'+id) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((res)=>setProduct(res.product)) },[]) return
